formatted_address: 531 Ang Mo Kio Ave 10, #01-2429 Cheng San Centre, Singapore 560531
name: Happy Hawkers @ AMK

reviews.text: Ordered the char siew / roasted pork rice and noodle. Both are pretty average, nothing outstanding but not bad also.

Very happy to be here. 5 star for the claypot rice stall. Affordable, $12 portion for 3 peeps to share and 2 soup. Total only $21. Come early before 730pm as their herbal chicken and other soup run out before that. However, didn‚Äôt try the other stalls so can‚Äôt give it 5 stars. But was happy to stumble to this coffee shop as all the stores are closed in the hawker Center nearby.

I think this is the most nice Vietnamese üáªüá≥ food I had in Singapore !!!! Is more nicer than shopping mall Vietnam food *So Pho* All that !! Is really original Vietnamese open one ! A lot Vietnamese customers also ! All the dish is very very nice the ingredients is very fresh ! Almost all the dish have Mint leaf . They have a lot original Vietnam food that I can‚Äôt find in shopping mall one , The soup is very yummy !!! I most most most recommend is the dry noodle üçú make me can‚Äôt forgotten until now ! The green bean dessert must eat and must mix with the coconut ü•• sauce !

Would have given 5 stars because the tze char stall is fantastic‚Äîfriendly staff and great food.

However, the drinks stall completely ruined the experience. On 27 Feb around 1pm, there were two staff: one making the coffee and another at the counter. The lady making the coffee was friendly, but the counter staff was extremely impatient, despite there being no queue.

When I ordered a Milo Dinosaur (which wasn‚Äôt available), she showed clear annoyance. When I asked for a canned green tea, she shouted at me and my students to take it from the fridge. She even shouted at the coffee lady while confirming if my coffee was hot or cold.

Unacceptable service given that the coffee shop is called Happy Hawker. I would have been happier if I have gotten my drinks from ITE instead.

The Vietnamese stall and roasted delights stall in this Hawker center are just brilliant.

The best Vietnamese food I've had in Singapore at a very affordable  price..(6$ for most sets)

Even the presentation of the food is many levels above what you expect from a hawker stall and won't look out of place in a star restaurant.

Its literally a hidden gem!

Roasted delights shop is pretty good too

vicinity: 531 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 10, #01-2429 Cheng San Centre
